'Once again, we would like to warmly thank the many voters who trusted us' @PSofficiel
'Wallonia, Brussels and the Wallonia-Brussels Federation are facing daunting challenges'
'The first priority is the creation of economic activities and the creation of jobs'
'Together, we must' never pursue the economic recovery of Wallonia and Brussels and strengthen social cohesion '
'Negotiations for the formation of the Walloon Government and the Wallonia-Brussels Federation will take place with the PS and the cdH'
'Negotiations for the formation of the Government of Brussels, francophone side, will take place with the PS, the FDF and the cdH'
'We have ambition, great determination and immense motivation for Wallonia and Brussels to move forward'

After the foundation of this fund, we have a variety of projects, events related to culture, art, and our common history (cont) http://t.co/H7HSRt5gPQ
At the core of our union, there are common roots, common culture, history, and we are working together on this solid foundation.
Therefore, we will do our best to further strengthen TURKSOY's activities in the future.
As regards political issues, there is a great need for mutual support in international organizations.
I want to emphasize, especially, Mr. Nursultan Nazarbayev's step.
He said that recently Armenia's founding meeting of the Eurasian Economic Union in Astana (cont) http://t.co/AIFostzDo7
The Azerbaijani people appreciate it. It was a true friendship and a brotherhood.
Construction of the Baku-Tbilisi-Kars railway is a historic event.
I am convinced that starting this year, the road will be open.
Implementation of this project will bring additional benefit to all Council members.
Both Turkmenistan and Kazakhstan have both independent and diversified export routes.
However, we need to take joint measures in this area to ensure our interests more fully and to strengthen our unity.
Our cooperation will be stronger in the coming years. New initiatives will be put forward.
At a certain stage, we need to think about establishing a joint investment fund.
